content.prompt: Dr. Say reported that self-esteem in young girls appears to be related to time spent watching videos of women demonstrating makeup and hairstyling techniques. The correlation coefficient was -0.63. Which of the following describes the relationship between the variables?

choices.label: The more viewing time, the lower the self esteem
The less viewing time, the lower the self esteem
The greater the difficulty of the techniques viewed, the lower the self esteem
The lower the difficulty of the techniques viewed, the higher the self esteem

topic.text: 4.5: Social-Cognitive and Trait Theories of Personality

skill.text: 3.C: Interpret quantitative or qualitative inferential data from a given table, graph, chart, figure, or diagram.
